Cleaning data 
```{r Q1 Reding Homicide data}
url <- paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/",
              "data-homicides/refs/heads/master/homicide-data.csv")

homicides <- read_csv(file = url)
head(homicides, n = 5)

#mutate a new column
homicides_2 <- homicides %>% 
  mutate(city_name = paste(city, state, sep=", ") ) %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date))

homicides_2

#new data frame
#group by new columns closed without arrest and open
#mutate by the new columns and count for the values 


unsolved_db <- homicides_2 %>% 
              mutate(total_hom = if_else(disposition == "Closed without arrest"| disposition == "Closed by arrest", TRUE, FALSE))%>% 
              group_by(city_name) %>% 
              summarize(solved = sum(total_hom == TRUE), 
                        unsolved = sum(total_hom == FALSE)) %>% 
              mutate(solved = as.numeric(solved),
                      unsolved = as.numeric(unsolved)) %>% 
              mutate(total = rowSums(select(., solved, unsolved, ), na.rm = TRUE))
            
    unsolved_db

unsolved_db <- unsolved_db[-c(49), ]
    unsolved_db

```
